website_summaries.verdict: If you like the idea of a mountable high velocity fan in a space-saving design, this is a good choice.
pros: With its well-designed 12-inch blade, it is capable of putting out decent air in a size that is more compact than most of its competitors
The ability to mount it on the wall also makes it more versatile than others
cons: The airflow isn't quite as powerful as larger models, but it does a good job for the size
Some owners have reported less than attentive customer service

customer_reviews.title: If you need an industrial fan, this is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.text: This industrial strength fan is a great investment. We purchased four of these for my workplace. They have been run continually for 12 hours, seven days a week throughout last summer and this summer and have never had one problem. This fan can be mounted or propped on the floor. It’s three levels of power are helpful as you can use the fan in various settings. If you need a heavy duty industrial fan, this is the one to buy. I am completely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jpmonterey

customer_reviews.title: They work great! We have them mounted on our outdoor patio ...
customer_reviews.text: They work great! We have them mounted on our outdoor patio they cool down the patio and help keep away the bugs. Oh ya this is just on medium we haven't had to use high and our patio is 26 X 20 so not a small space. Plus they are quite and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Linn Campbell

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME GARAGE FAN.
customer_reviews.text: Got it an today, I knew how I was going to install this in my garage. No ceiling to screw into, etc. I used the garage door angle irons. I used a bolt on the center screw and tightened it up, and followed with drilling through the angle iron holes into the fan hanger where I added two more bolts. job done in under 30 minuets. Air King has three fan settings and off. Its very quiet and i'm a BIG fan!
customer_reviews.author: Paul E

customer_reviews.title: very nice fan
customer_reviews.text: my gf liked it so much when I went to put it up in the garage, she asked if I would try it out in the corner of the kitchen before I mounted in my garage. You can guess were it ended up at...had to order another for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: runs continually
customer_reviews.text: I have this unit and a 14" of the same. The 14 has run non-stop for 22 months so far. I hope this one does the same. They are in a greenhouse under the E and W ends of the T shaped house. Excluding the horrendous heat of '18 they are doing fine. I am building a swamp cooler. Global warming will kill us.
customer_reviews.author: al stanton

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: We have these mounted outdoors in Texas and they look modern and give off a lot of air.
customer_reviews.author: Jane T.

customer_reviews.title: The mounting bracket does not come off for installation....
customer_reviews.text: Without the mounting bracket being removable, mounting this fan is impossible with one person. Not only can you not use a screw gun, but you need screws with nut heads that you can use a ratchet to tighten them only. Also be careful as this only has a single hole in the bracket at the back angle, there are no holes for corner mounting. Make sure you can drill through metal to corner mount this. I have not turned this on yet, mounting has been such a pain and I have not gotten that far!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: Love the fan, have it in my garage for my garage gym, and it definitely has done its duty. Installation had me throwing some colorful words around; however, with help/as a two person job there is no problem. I have it mounted hanging down from a wood beam and it has stayed put without any issues at all!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Made Well
customer_reviews.text: This Fan does not oscillate so make sure you position it in a good spot so you can get the most air circulation. It's made very well, good quality fan.
customer_reviews.author: JPW

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived damaged and Amazon shipped replacement right away. Bought this for my daughter’s college dorm room. Used heavy duty zip ties to hang it from some pipes above her bed since the walls cannot have anything mounted into them. Very quiet on low setting. She really likes it. It cools down her room quickly!
customer_reviews.author: KAM

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I hooked up this fan in my garage due to the fact that I live in Florida and my garage faces the afternoon sun. The garage heats up rather quickly and gets very hot, the fan moves the air around quite well and keeps a nice breeze on me while working in the garage. the reason for the four stars is for the price I expected a little more wind but you get what you get. It's not bad just a little less than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Will Rust away in less than a year!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this thing a littler over a month and it’s starting to rust in multiple spots. It’s installed in a dry spot in the lanai and I don’t have a pool. With that’s speed this thing is junk in 1 yr pretty hefty price tag for such a workmanship! Otherwise very solid fan but really guys!!!! I never wirte reviews but this is insane!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several Air King Fans in the past. They are great fans and this one is still the Air King Quality. Excellent air flow, quiet and smooth. Very glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Blind woodcrafter

customer_reviews.title: American made quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I installed in an enclosed trailer wall into a metal stud. I drilled two additional holes into the handle for extra support into the stud.
customer_reviews.author: zzRTD

customer_reviews.title: For the warehouse
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for installation in our warehouse. No one has said they don't work so I assume they do what they are intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: TexxasGal

customer_reviews.title: Just right for white noise and my tinnitus.
customer_reviews.text: Good fan but not much in the way of mounting as there is one approximate 3/8 diameter hole on the bracket. Had to drill a few holes to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for fitness room
customer_reviews.text: Great fan for fitness room. Moves air, not very loud, can move position up and down from base. Better than other industrial fans purchased. Also good pull adjustment. Wouldn't go with any other brand in the future. Just know as the sizes get bigger- the sound goes up but still not as loud as other commercial fans.
customer_reviews.author: Kimfit

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: HEAVY. Specs say 5.44 lbs, bathroom scale says 10.1 -- almost double. Big consideration when hanging two off the awning. Good airflow, quiet, discrete after removing all the stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Kolstad

customer_reviews.title: it serves as a fantastic white noise generator
customer_reviews.text: Solid power with durable construction used in a bedroom corner to circulate air at night. Works fairly well, with my only complaint determining how to focus the wind in a single direction vs multi- escape. Added bogus, it serves as a fantastic white noise generator.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a small room
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan for my small bathroom. Wish the high speed was a bit stronger but it works to help ventilate the room.
customer_reviews.author: Rhenda

customer_reviews.title: A Solid Fan
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a solid fan. It easily mounts in a position that allows you to rotate it to cover any location in your work area. Just bolt in place with a fender washer. I have set mine in a location that allows it to draw air from a shaded cool area. I got tired of replacing made in China fans every few months, seems they are built to freeze up when put in constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Glazier

customer_reviews.title: No equipment screws etc came with it.
customer_reviews.text: Also not 15 inches across. It would have been great to get what I ordered with parts to install.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for use in ag facilities where livestock, poultry or other animals are confined
customer_reviews.text: Intended to use this in our stable until I read the Safety Information 13) THIS FAN DOES NOT MEET THE REQUIREMENTS OF NEC ARTICLE 547-7 (2002). Sadly I will need to replace it and find another location for use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Used all summet under gazebo. Could use a little longer cord. Installed on corner of gazebo instead of top.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and powerful! Love this for my barn and garage
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: DOES WHAT IT SHOULD
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed to move air under our attached awning in Okinawa, Japan, and these are the same brand that the gyms use across the world. Very strong and moves the air. If you do not want a strong air mover, then move to another product. If you want a strong air mover, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: CMB

customer_reviews.title: A box fan will suffice.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is VERY small. The area the fan circulates air is thinner than a laser pointer. For $80 this is just not worth it. Just get a cheap box fan.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This fan is an awesome product for the price I bought another fan similar ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan is an awesome product for the price I bought another fan similar to it (Which I returned, and it was two times the cost) that looked similar to it and it didn't have any Power like this one does... I have it on my back covered porch, and I live in Florida and it is wonderful !!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality fan, moves a lot of air and is pretty quiet. Had to buy a heavy duty book shelf mount to mount the fan with on the wall. It worked great once I drilled the hole larger in the shelf bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful and good looking too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these fans to install under a balcony at a gym and even on low they help keep the area cool and they are quiet to boot. They do get louder at higher speeds but not unreasonably. The one negative was that I had to remove the fan from the mounting bracket to install them and it was a little bit difficult to get the fan back on the bracket. By this I mean the screws were a little tricky because of their length. This is nothing that would dissuade me from buying them but just an FYI. They push a lot of air and have a very low wattage rating so I could put 6 on one circuit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is awesome. My husband mounted it on the ceiling of our workout area, and it does a great job! It's very powerful and really cools off the area. I also appreciate that Air & Water e-mailed me a tracking number, and that I received my fan so quickly. I will definitely order from Air & Water again, and I highly recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: A. Peckinpaugh

customer_reviews.title: I did not get that mount that is pictured. ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not get that mount that is pictured. It came with a different one that wont work how I wanted it too.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Skeet

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan. Mount causes some vibration.
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. Pushes some serious air for its size. It does create a slight rattle to nearby lights. Nothing major but it can be heard on high speed.
customer_reviews.author: schnell

customer_reviews.title: Laurielu
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to install, what I expected, seems to be a good product for the money. Purchased for under a carport. We only sit under half of it, I would recommend 2 fans if you were going to use an entire carport for seating.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: powerful... using in greenhouse..reasonably quiet. like 3 speed option. like the various mounting options. Strong materials used...not feel flimsy. Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: NW LADY

customer_reviews.title: This thing really blows!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most fantastic air circulator I have ever used. It really blows. Its really quiet. It hangs on my wall. I pull the chain to start it, then it really blows. It adds a retro-cool flare to my bedroom that you cant get from plastic fans. I wish the amazing Air King label on the front was actually a pendant and not just a sticker. I just might buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one - these are great fans.
customer_reviews.author: LindaBee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This little fan packs a big punch we use 2 of them in both of our horses stalls well worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: GUNNERS MOM

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, however, doesn't produce the amount of air I need for my backyard terrace (maybe too small)
customer_reviews.author: Font420

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fan I only wished that Ordered a larger one
customer_reviews.author: mauijimky

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. Runs quiet, looks nice and blows a lot of air. I have it mounted on a bracket arm over a tanning booth to cool the tanner. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Xaa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty quiet and moves air well. Makes patio comfortable on hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: great fans
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 to fit in my attic to blow out hot air. they are well made and durable. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. E.

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Fan?
customer_reviews.text: You sold this as an outdoor fan and the first thing the instructions said was "not for outdoor use".
customer_reviews.author: Nels A. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: This small unit is a powerhouse! I placed it ...
customer_reviews.text: This small unit is a powerhouse ! I placed it in my hot kitchen, WOW ! It works wonders !
customer_reviews.author: David Latina

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up. Back housing broke, even ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold up. Back housing broke, even with the fan not being moved or manipulated. Now won't start or turn on. Generally just an overpriced piece of s***.
customer_reviews.author: david ruppert

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with quality and appearance
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't what I thought it was (oscillating), but turned out perfectly. Pleased with quality and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Trippe

customer_reviews.title: Very Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these fans to help with cross ventilation at our store and they are very effective, and quiet. Does not add additional noise to our shop.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Koutras

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay for awhile..... Barely got over one year of light use and it has locked up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AIR KING 9312 FAN
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE A BATHROOM WITH NO WINDOW,HAS A CIELING FAN AS USUAL LIKE MOST BATHROOMS DO BUT IN THE SUMMER JUST NOT ENOUGH TO COOL THE ROOM DOWN. MY BATHROOM BEING ON THE SMALL SIDE NEEDED A FAN TO ATTACH ONTO THE WALL AND THIS ONE IS PERFECT FOR THAT,MY BATHROOM IS NOW COOL AND CAN DO MY HAIR WITHOUT BEING SOAKING WET SWEATING BLOWING DRY MY HAIR,HAD IT ATTACHED TO THE WALL BUT THIS FAN CAN ALSO GO ON THE CIELING.BECAUSE OF THE PLUG SITUATION IN MY BATHROOM WAS BETTER TO GO ON THE WALL,I RECOMMEND THIS FAN. Irene
customer_reviews.author: Irene MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Air King Fan
customer_reviews.text: We mounted the fan in a workshop. It works great , cooling down the area. Powerful unit. Very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia McCann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our porch.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved them. These are a perfect size and its nice they just plug in so we can take down this winter. We were going todo the ceiling fan thing on the porch but these are much more practical for outside.
customer_reviews.author: SHUGA

customer_reviews.title: Hung fan under roof of my deck to direct grill ...
customer_reviews.text: Hung fan under roof of my deck to direct grill smoke in specific direction. Strong multi speed fan works well
customer_reviews.author: Robert McNabb

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a small area
customer_reviews.text: pretty good output, but I expected better airflow for my back porch.
customer_reviews.author: raymond nelson

customer_reviews.title: ok fan
customer_reviews.text: Fan seems to be of acceptable quality. Dose not seems to move as much air as it should. Will try a larger size (18") next time.
customer_reviews.author: rj2506

customer_reviews.title: King air
customer_reviews.text: Great fan moved a lot of air. Not a lot of noise. Got 4 of them for my garage. A++
customer_reviews.author: Chris Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. I work a lot outside and I plug it in as I'm working. It's very sturdy, well-built and throws out one hell of a wind.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Louise

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice air flow we have it on our back porch it south Texas and notice a significance difference in air movement love it
customer_reviews.author: John Bedford

customer_reviews.title: air king 9312
customer_reviews.text: fun vibrated really bad on low cant even be used at that level. could be a little smoother fan. would not buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Everything I was wanting and expecting. Perfect for my use. Moves great amount of air and pretty quiet too. Use it at the lake cabin on the deck and its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: coolingmaster2004

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for 5 year continuous use.
customer_reviews.text: Have owned unit since March of 2014. Its run over 5 years non stop. Indoor use. Bearing just started getting noisy, so having to retire it. Thats over 45,000 hours use. The second one i have is still running. I wonder if bearing/ motor are replaceable or probably not cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Dia

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, great product! I now have some very happy chickens :-)
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase, product as described. Easy to hang, put it in my chicken coop to keep my girls cool during the summer and they love it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ladywolff

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in the corner of my outdoor porch and aimed it down at me while cooking over a hot griddle. Powerful wind keeps me cool. Very nice and seems to be well made
customer_reviews.author: D. Lane

customer_reviews.title: High Quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: No problem setting the fan up. It is sturdy, well made, and simple to hang above the door. Definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: E.E. Anders

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh, a tornado in my home!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for above my treadmill and I was thrilled to find the perfect fan! I have this overhead, attached to a solid beam and I finally have a high end gym experience. This fan is very sturdy and high quality! And wow, this fan brings a much needed tornado to my workouts. The airflow is direct and just where I need it. I sometimes find that I don't want to stop working out because I love the way this fan feels. Hey, good for me, anything that keeps me on the treadmill is a great thing. I love this fan!
customer_reviews.author: LoveToShop

customer_reviews.title: Good air flow
customer_reviews.text: These are great for workshops and outdoor kitchen. A bit pricey but so far they seem rugged and efficient Pivot bracket is a nice feature
customer_reviews.author: Sailor64

customer_reviews.title: Save your $$ and buy a larger fan!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3-of these for my garage. Save your money and buy one larger fan. These are not worth $75/each! They barely move the air. So many reviews say they do, but I bought not one, not two, but THREE of them and they don't move much air at all. At least they're quiet. Good for a small room, but not a 2-car garage.
customer_reviews.author: F. Hetherington

customer_reviews.title: Great commercial fan!
customer_reviews.text: So powerful. Perfect for our space. Bought 2 to get AC flowing only using it at the lowest speed. Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Useful for ventilating a porch
customer_reviews.text: I have three these 12 inch models, which I have mounted on the ceiling of my covered porch to create a breeze. I usually have them set on the low or medium settings, which is pretty silent. The maximum speed is noticeable, but you wouldn't have to raise your voice to have a conversation. They appear to be very sturdy for household use, I will be surprised if they don't last years.
customer_reviews.author: Mido

customer_reviews.title: Works well for its size
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a faulty box fan in a horse stall with one of these. It is well made, and provided adequate air flow. The mount has a single whole centered on it. In order to get a good mount I had to drill the wall and use a coach bolt through it. It has a pull chain on the back to adjust the speed. I am thinking of replacing all my box fans with these.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing Air Flow
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in the air flow of this fan. You cannot feel air from this fan more than 5 or 6 feet from it and up close it is not great. I suspect part of the problem is the disproportionately large logo in the front that blocks a lot of the air. I bought a Maxx Air 18" also and am very pleased with it. Beware of this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. G. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to be blown away.
customer_reviews.text: As Advertized. A Quality made, all metal, heavy duty fan. Works great and pushes a large amount of air.. No noisier then any other fan of this size. For mounting one can use a large lag screw or bolt depending on where or how your are using. Also comes with a safety wire and clips incase the lag screw fails or the mounting frame? I used a large bolt to mount and drilled a couple extra holes for a couple smaller bolts for extra security. Excellent heavy duty chord, 3 speed fan..
customer_reviews.author: S. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews on amazon before we committed to one and boy am I glad I did. We put this on our outdoor, Houston heat, patio and it blows very well For it's size. We have a ceiling fan also and this is an extra boost of wind needed on shot summer Texas day. We are going to buy a second as well.
customer_reviews.author: CorrieFleming

customer_reviews.title: Great greenhouse fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan to use in my hobby greenhouse. It's a good size and works well so far. It also comes with several mounting options, which is convenient. It's a little loud on its lowest setting, which surprised me. But I don't need a quiet fan, just one that works outside in high humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Best fan ever. I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and solid. Moves a lot of air, not too loud, doesn't rattle.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Moves a lot of air and not too loud. ...
customer_reviews.text: Moves a lot of air and not too loud. Metal blades > plastic blades. I wish the pull chain was a little longer, I have to stretch to reach it.
customer_reviews.author: Mod MINI

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in our outdoor beach bar. A little larger and heavier than expected but still looks good hanging in the corner above the bar. Sort of has a vintage look which fits great with the decor. It has three speeds and circulates the air really well.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Langehennig

customer_reviews.title: powerful yet quiet
customer_reviews.text: Great out put of air and pretty quiet. I installed this in our store, and though it won't eliminate the A/C, it certainly helps. We might need to add one more.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W

customer_reviews.title: A good ceiling air mover.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a fan that would distribute air both heated and cooled, between two garages. It works perfectly. Works silently. I usually run it on the low speed and it still does the job.
customer_reviews.author: lorencherylp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fan...compact and powerful. Moves air effectively even at the low speed setting.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W.

customer_reviews.title: Great airflow for an outdoor screened porch
customer_reviews.text: Great airflow for an outdoor screened porch. I used 2 for an area that is 20 ft x 12 ft.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The Fan!
customer_reviews.text: Little pricey but worth it! Installed it next to stove at the beginning of winter, and has not been turned off since. Pretty quite, and made with quality!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Gruener

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, good air flow
customer_reviews.text: Check size smaller than I thought. Good construction, good air flow
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Quality grade
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, quality grade, easy to install. Pull chain with 3 speed settings, runs quite blows hard. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gulfcoast

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for 15x20 gym
customer_reviews.text: like it better than the bigger one for a small gym, great fan
customer_reviews.author: Judith K. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Giving made in USA a bad name.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a while back, but haven't had to use it. Now I used it for one day and it won't turn on again. Must be cheaply built. Giving made in USA a bad name.
customer_reviews.author: LegalMom

customer_reviews.title: She Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this fan. Won't go to sleep without it.
customer_reviews.author: David J Getman

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Still running strong after several years of 24/7 use in my greenhouse
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Hinshaw

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Really solid fan. It looks like it will last well. Made in the USA. Installed in narrow kitchen window as exhaust fan.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Knox

customer_reviews.title: quiet
customer_reviews.text: These fans are sturdy and, for a fan, quiet. I think it has to do with them being all metal and bolted together tight. I'd be worried about kids being near fast spinning metal blades, so keep that in mind. I bought three of these and hung up two. My friend was jealous and convinced me to sell him the third.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Christine Winslow

customer_reviews.title: pretty strong. husband likes it for his outdoor man
customer_reviews.text: pretty strong. husband likes it for his outdoor man cave
customer_reviews.author: Kris Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small fan but moves a lot of air for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Great fan.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I wish I had bought the larger version. But the fan works just as described. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Becky W

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for nothing
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive for nothing. much rather have gotten a 20 dollar fan and hung it up.
customer_reviews.author: Brother J

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Fan
customer_reviews.text: I installed this fan in a covered outdoor porch to help circulate the air. It was easy to install, and works great. Ran it for months with no problems. Very heavy duty design.
customer_reviews.author: Frogturtle

customer_reviews.title: Works great! 3 stars as I will wait for another ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! 3 stars as I will wait for another month to see how long it works. If it still works in Jan 2016 I will give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Thupten

customer_reviews.title: bad inversion....
customer_reviews.text: Is nothing special and to spencer...:::::::((((((((( i don't recomend this fan..thanksss. Nada especial y demasiado caro. No recomiendo este ventilador.....
customer_reviews.author: yanet

product_meta.title: Air King 9312 Powder-Coated Steel Multi-Mount Wall Fan, Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Fan

The Air King 9312 Industrial Grade Wall Fan is used to cool and circulate air in industrial or commercial settings including loading docks, warehouses, health clubs and other commercial or industrial spaces. This fan can be monted to a wall, ceiling or I-beam to save floor space. With a powerful motor and steel construction this fan is the perfect cooling and air circulation solution. Air King has added a tough powder coat finish to the blade guard. This unit is tested in accordance with AMCA standard 230-99, meets the requirements of ARRA and is ETL and OSHA compliant. It copmes with a 1 year limited warranty. The fan is equipped with a 3 speed, 1 phase, open motor, sleeve bearing and permanent split capacitor. It moves 1360, 1170 or 1010 cfm on high, medium or low speed. The motor is rated at 0.8, 0.6 and 0.5 amps, 85, 76 and 64 watts and 56, 49 and 42 decibels on hegh, meduim and low speed. The fan head pivots to direct air flow. Features a single bolt mount for fast installation. Secondary support cable included. Other features include rear mounted pull cord, steel handle, steel blade guard and 9 foot, 3 conductor SJT type power cord. 

About Air King  Air King is an industry leader and offers a full line of industrial grade and commercial grade air circulating solutions. Whether it's for an industrial setting such as a manufacturing plant, warehouse or factory or a commercial setting such as an office, school or hospital, Air King has the perfect solution for you. Air King is known for its powerful motors that last for years.
